content.p: Carrot Search is a spin-off company set up by the authors of the Carrot2 framework to provide professional installation, customization, maintenance, clustering and text mining consulting services based on the Open Source framework and proprietary software.

Carrot Search offers Lingo3G -- the third generation high-performance document clustering engine featuring multilingual and hierarchical clustering, synonyms, advanced tuning capabilities and more. For more details, please contact Carrot Search.
